verses.verse: And <WG1161> it came to pass <WG1096> on <WG1722> the second <WG1207> sabbath <WG4521> after the first <WG1207>, that he <WG846> went <WG1279> through <WG1223> the corn fields <WG4702>; and <WG2532> his <WG846> disciples <WG3101> plucked <WG5089> the ears of corn <WG4719>, and <WG2532> did eat <WG2068>, rubbing <WG5597> them in their hands <WG5495>.
